metadata.synopsis: The Jolly Boys, a group of London booze hounds, are stunned to learn that charter member "Spider" Dale (Andy Serkis) is marrying his girlfriend, Annie (Rebecca Craig). Hoping to scuttle the engagement by capturing footage of his friend's epic partying, "Des" Dixon (Milo Twomey) films Spider's last months of freedom. Taking the form of an amateur video, this comedy follows the Jolly Boys, who soon realize that yet another member (Sacha Baron Cohen) is set to be married.
